imt: to the Maria.\textsc{dat} \textsc{3sg.dat} annoy.\textsc{3pl} the kids on\_purpose     and the teachers also    it   do
src: *A la Maria li molesten els nens \emph{expressament} i els mestres també \emph{ho} \emph{fan}.
trs: \z

imt: to.the his brother \textsc{3msg.acc} overwhelms the new  responsibility
src: Al seu germà l’ atabala la nova responsabilitat.
trs: (lit.) ‘To his brother the new responsibility is overwhelming.’ \\

imt: to the Albert \textbf{\textsc{3sg.dat}} / \textbf{\textsc{3msg.acc}} annoys this photo       of himself
src: A l’ Albert\textsubscript{i} \{\textbf{li\textsubscript{i}} / \textbf{el\textsubscript{i}}\} molesta aquesta fotografia de si\_mateix\textsubscript{i}.
trs: (lit.) ‘To Albert this photo of himself is annoying.

src: A l’ Albert\textsubscript{i} \textbf{li\textsubscript{i}} agrada aquesta fotografia de si\_mateix\textsubscript{i}.
trs: Albert likes this photo of himself.

src: L’ Albert\textsubscript{i} envia una fotografia de si\_mateix\textsubscript{i/*j} a la Núria\textsubscript{j}.
trs: Albert sends a photo of himself to Nuria.
